name: Working days
description: The API returns the number of days,  hours, working days, working hours, wages, weekend days, and the list of public holidays of the requested date period and country. You can also add any number of working days or working hours to a given date. 50 countries and over 230 regional calendars are supported and we work hard to keep our database up to date by following government announcements regarding public holidays changes. All the calendars can be fully customized from our friendly working da...

api_methods.name: /1.3/get_info_day
api_methods.description: Get detailed information about a specific day.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date to analyze (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

utterances.utterance: What are the details for the day July 4, 2023, in the US?
Can you provide information about December 25, 2023, in the UK?
Tell me about the working day status for January 1, 2024, in Canada.
Is March 17, 2023, a public holiday in Ireland?
Get the working hours for November 11, 2023, in Germany.
What are the public holidays on April 25, 2023, in Australia?
Check if May 1, 2023, is a working day in France.
Provide details for October 10, 2023, in Japan.
Is August 15, 2023, a weekend day in Italy?
What is the status of February 14, 2023, in Brazil?

api_methods.name: /1.3/delete_custom_period
api_methods.description: Removing a previously defined custom period

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date of the custom period (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.description: The ID of the calendar we are customizing.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date of the custom period (YYYY-MM-DD) If omitted, end date will be equal to start date (one day custom period)

api_methods.name: /1.3/analyse
api_methods.description: Analyse a period (you provide a start_date and an end_date over a given calendar, we respond with the period analysis)

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: The end date's time (24 hours format, like 09:00 or 15:00, but not 3pm).If omitted, default value is 23:59.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: The start date's time (24 hours format, like 09:00 or 15:00, but not 3pm).If omitted, default value is 00:00

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

Calculate the number of weekend days in Canada between 2023-06-01 and 2023-06-30.
What are the public holidays in Germany from 2023-04-01 to 2023-04-30?
Find the total working hours in the UK from 2023-02-01 to 2023-02-28.
How many days are there in France from 2023-07-01 to 2023-07-31?
Get the list of public holidays in Australia between 2023-12-01 and 2023-12-31.
Calculate the number of working days in Japan from 2023-03-01 to 2023-03-31.
How many working hours are there in India from 2023-05-01 to 2023-05-31?
What are the public holidays in Italy from 2023-08-01 to 2023-08-31?
Find the number of weekend days in Brazil between 2023-09-01 and 2023-09-30.

api_methods.name: /1.3/add_working_hours
api_methods.description: Add an amount of working time to a given start date/time

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: The start time in a 24 hours format with leading zeros.

parameters.name: increment_time
parameters.description: The amount of working time to be added (or removed) to the start date time. Format H:i. This amount cannot exceed 5000 hours. For example, to add one hour: 1:00. To add 30 hours and 15 minutes: 30:15.  To remove 45 minutes: -0:45

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

utterances.utterance: Add 5 working hours to the start date of 2023-11-01 at 09:00 in the US.
Calculate the new date and time by adding 2 hours and 30 minutes to 2023-12-15 at 14:00 in Canada.
What is the date and time after adding 10 working hours to 2024-01-10 at 08:00 in the UK?
Add 3 hours to the start date of 2023-10-20 at 11:00 in Australia.
If I start on 2023-09-05 at 07:30 in Germany, what is the time after adding 8 working hours?
Add 15 hours to the start date of 2023-08-25 at 10:00 in Japan.
Calculate the new time by adding 4 hours and 45 minutes to 2023-07-14 at 13:00 in India.
What is the date and time after adding 20 working hours to 2023-06-30 at 09:15 in Brazil?
Add 7 hours to the start date of 2023-05-22 at 08:45 in South Africa.
If I start on 2023-04-10 at 12:00 in Italy, what is the time after adding 6 working hours?

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

api_methods.name: /1.3/define_custom_period
api_methods.description: Defining a custom period (typically days of vacations of an employee or days of annual closure of a company) can be done from the working days websites user interface but can also be done programmatically from the API. A typical use case would be to retrieve the vacations of the workers out of the human ressources software and insert them into a custom calendar, then being able to query available working days.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A textual description of the custom period (up to 30 caracters)

parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.description: The ID of the calendar we are customizing.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date of the custom period (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: The color of custom period when displayed on the calendar. Colors can be useful in order to classify custom periods. Default value is orange.

parameters.name: start_morning
parameters.description: Does the custom period starts in the morning of the start_date? Default value is true. (This parameter can be used if you want to create half day custom periods.)

parameters.name: end_afternoon
parameters.description: Does the custom period ends in the afternoon of the end_date? Default value is true. (This parameter can be used if you want to create half day custom periods.)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date of the custom period (YYYY-MM-DD) If omitted, end date will be equal to start date (one day custom period)

utterances.utterance: Set up a custom period for the annual company retreat in Hawaii starting from 2024-05-15.

parameters.description: annual company retreat

utterances.utterance: Define a custom period for the employee training session in New York starting on 2023-11-01 with a blue color code.

parameters.description: employee training session

utterances.utterance: Create a custom period for the office renovation from 2023-12-20 to 2024-01-10.

parameters.description: office renovation

utterances.utterance: Add a custom period for the summer break starting on 2024-06-01, ending in the afternoon of 2024-06-15.

parameters.description: summer break

utterances.utterance: Schedule a custom period for the winter holidays starting on 2023-12-24 with a red color.

parameters.description: winter holidays

utterances.utterance: Define a custom period for the team building event in the mountains starting on 2024-03-10.

parameters.description: team building event

utterances.utterance: Set a custom period for the annual software update from 2024-02-01 to 2024-02-05.

parameters.description: annual software update

utterances.utterance: Create a custom period for the spring festival starting on 2024-04-15, with a green color.

parameters.description: spring festival

utterances.utterance: Add a custom period for the product launch event starting on 2024-07-20, ending in the afternoon.

parameters.description: product launch event

utterances.utterance: Schedule a custom period for the research conference from 2024-09-05 to 2024-09-10.

parameters.description: research conference

api_methods.name: /1.3/add_working_days
api_methods.description: Add (or remove) any number of working days to a date.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: increment
parameters.description: The number of working days you want to add to your start date (positive or negative integer but not zero)

parameters.name: include_start
parameters.description: Should the count include the start_date? Default value is true. If you set include_start to false ("false" or "0"), the count will start at the next working day (or previous working day, if increment is negative)

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

utterances.utterance: Add 5 working days to the start date of 2023-11-01 in the US.
Calculate the date 10 working days after 2023-12-15 in Canada.
What is the date 7 working days before 2024-01-10 in the UK?
Add 15 working days to 2023-10-20 in Australia, excluding the start date.
Find the date 3 working days after 2023-11-25 in Germany using the Federal holidays configuration.
Calculate the date 20 working days from 2023-09-01 in Japan.
What is the date 8 working days before 2023-12-05 in France?
Add 12 working days to 2023-10-15 in India, including the start date.
Find the date 6 working days after 2023-11-30 in Brazil.
Calculate the date 4 working days before 2024-01-20 in Italy.
